long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a automation for Spira which creates a task per current opened incident in Spira.
The abilities:
- validate the current incident for appropriate statuses ready to take into work (Not fixed, DEV backlog, Draft)
- allow inputing the estimation
- create a linked task with all prefilled fields: Name, release, estimation, task type
